verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>. I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> with my whole <S%H3824>heart<s%>, In the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%>, and in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are <S%H1419>great<s%>, Sought <S%H1875>out<s%> of all them that have pleasure <S%H2656>therein<s%>.
His <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%>; And his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5975>endureth<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to be <S%H2143>remembered<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful<s%>.
He hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2964>food<s%> unto them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H5769>him<s%>: He will ever be <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
He hath <S%H5046>showed<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of his <S%H4639>works<s%>, In <S%H5414>giving<s%> them the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
The <S%H4639>works<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%>; All his <S%H6490>precepts<s%> are <S%H539>sure<s%>.
They are <S%H5564>established<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>; They are <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H571>truth<s%> and <S%H3477>uprightness<s%>.

He hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>; He hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: <S%H6918>Holy<s%> and <S%H3372>reverend<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; A <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2451>understanding<s%> have all they that <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H8416>commandments<s%>: His praise <S%H5975>endureth<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
